quotes.text: You're a slave to likesâ€”die already.
You're a disgusting pervert.
Your lungs are begging for mercy, idiot.
Instagram won't fill the void in your pathetic life.
You're literally wiring your brain to prefer pixels over real intimacy.
Each cigarette is another nail in your coffin. Keep it up, genius.
You've wasted years scrolling. What achievements do you have to show?
That dopamine hit from TikTok is making you a zombie.
No one respects a porn addict. Not even you.
Your drinking is disappointing everyone who loves you.
Try being productive instead of refreshing your feed again.
Your willpower is weaker than your WiFi signal.
Porn is destroying your ability to connect with real people.
That cigarette shows how little you value your future.
Your social media addiction is making you shallow and boring.
You need to touch grass. Put the phone down, loser.
How many brain cells have you killed while watching that filth?
Every drink you take makes you more useless tomorrow.
You care more about strangers' approval than your own future.
Real winners don't need porn. But you wouldn't know.
Your body is a temple, not a toxic waste dump.
Social media is the junk food of human connection. And you're obese.
One hour of porn = one step closer to being alone forever.
Your smoking habit screams 'I make terrible life choices.'
Stop scrolling and do something meaningful with your life.
You've become the kind of loser who gets dopamine from hearts and thumbs.
Porn is stealing your energy, motivation, and future.
Smoking isn't a personality trait, it's a weakness.
Your addiction to likes is making you a shallow version of yourself.
Your brain on porn is literally shrinking. Like your chances at success.
